title: Is this a bug?
body:
http://imgur.com/UVPGCSD

Or does the red marker not show up for posts in the Misc. Sub?

replies.body: I just pushed a change so we show the Fist icon if a Rioter created the thread or has commented on it.

Currently, we're using the Fist icon to indicate that a Rioter has commented within the discussion thread. We don't show it if the Rioter *created* the thread. Maybe this is too confusing and we should just switch it.
I think it'd be a lot easier if it was used for both. Either way people know there is a red post in there that way.

it shows the thread creators name under the thread name, and their name is red if they are a rioter. I think if they did have the fist when it was just that a rioter started the thread, they would need to make it a different color.

I know this has nothing to do with ur post, sry, but it wont let me post on the forums at all. when I go to hit post, it does nothing, it doesn't pop up with the hand. it will click on it, but it wont let me actually post. pls fix I have things to have everyone ignore <3
